definition: A term referring to a person or thing associated with the city of Cologne, Germany. It is commonly used to describe a resident of Cologne or something originating from or related to the city.

examples.german: Der Kölner Dom ist eine berühmte Kathedrale in Köln.
examples.english: The Cologne Cathedral is a famous cathedral in Cologne.

examples.german: Die Kölner Karnevalssession beginnt am 11.11. um 11:11 Uhr.
examples.english: The Cologne Carnival season starts on November 11th at 11:11 am.

examples.german: Köln ist die größte Stadt in Nordrhein-Westfalen und hat den Beinamen 'Domstadt'.
examples.english: Cologne is the largest city in North Rhine-Westphalia and is nicknamed 'Domstadt' (Cathedral City).

examples.german: Der Kölner Zoo beherbergt über 10.000 Tiere aus aller Welt.
examples.english: The Cologne Zoo houses over 10,000 animals from all over the world.

examples.german: Kölsch ist das typische Bier, das in Köln gebraut wird.
examples.english: Kölsch is the typical beer brewed in Cologne.
